name: HouseQuinley
_source: s;Quinley;Yeah I kinda figured, but still...|daaang, look at this place, though!{w}{clear} Even with all that's happened, everything's still so tidy.
s;Quinley;Huh!{w} Would you look at that!{w} My old tome!{w}{clear}{c:expression;Quinley;Closeyes}I can't believe it's still here, even after all this time...
s;SElspeth;Quinley, can I talk to you for a moment?
s;SQuinley;Huh?{w} Sure, but...{w} what's up?|You look concerned.
s;SElspeth;That's because I am.|Quin, are you feeling alright?
s;SQuinley;Yup!{w} Weird question, though.|Why do you ask?
s;SElspeth;Lately, you've been seeming...{w} distracted.{w}{clear}I've noticed your focus on your studies slipping, and more than that, you're just...{w} you're distant, lately.
s;SQuinley;Oh, gosh, really?{w} I'm sorry, I-I never even noticed.{w}{clear}Everything's business as usual for me!
s;SQuinley;Uh-huh!{w} Oh!{w} Maybe we could kill two birds with one stone!|You could be my tutor, and we could-
s;SElspeth;I know about the tome, Quin.
s;SQuinley;...{w} Crap.{w} Okay, okay, look, it's not what it looks like.
s;SElspeth;Oh?{w} It looks to me like you're practicing dark magic at the expense of all your other duties!
s;SQuinley;Okay, I guess it's kiiiinda what it looks like, but-!
s;SElspeth;These are forbidden powers you're flirting with, Quinley.{w}{clear}Powers that have swallowed up far greater men than you or I.
s;SQuinley;It's just some simple studying, that's all!{w}{clear}I'm being safe as can be, honest!
s;SElspeth;And that 's why you're keeping secrets from me?{w} To be "safe?"
s;SQuinley;I'm keeping secrets because I knew you'd react like this!{w}{clear}I'm outta here!
s;SQuinley;I don't have it.|Just leave me alone!
#//Quinley tries to leave, then a magic sound effect plays and she freezes
s;SElspeth;You know I hate to use magic on my own flesh and blood, but...{w} this is for your own good.{w}{clear}The paralysis will wear off in just a moment.
s;SElspeth;There it is.{w} I'll be disposing of this one myself.{w}{clear}Don't let me ever catch you with something like this again, you hear me?
s;SElspeth;...{w} I thought you better than this, Quin.{w}{clear}{c:expression;SQuinley;HalfCloseEyes}I'm...{w} disappointed.

s;Quinley;You know, she'd be proud of me{semicolon}{w}{c:expression;Quinley;HalfCloseEyes} I never let her catch me after that.{w}{clear}And to think, she couldn't even destroy the tome like she'd wanted...
s;Quinley;Hehehe...{w} I always knew you'd come back to me eventually.{w}{clear}Let's go have some fun, shall we?
